Create GroundStation BME;
GMAT BME.CentralBody = Earth;
GMAT BME.StateType = Spherical;
GMAT BME.HorizonReference = Sphere;
GMAT BME.Location1 = 47.47;
GMAT BME.Location2 = 19.06;
GMAT BME.Location3 = 0.0;
GMAT BME.Id = 'StationId';
GMAT BME.IonosphereModel = 'None';
GMAT BME.TroposphereModel = 'None';
GMAT BME.DataSource = 'Constant';
GMAT BME.Temperature = 295.1;
GMAT BME.Pressure = 1013.5;
GMAT BME.Humidity = 55;
GMAT BME.MinimumElevationAngle = 7;
